T02D1254:253b-1: shr'i he badzra sa patta ti mandala bi dhi /
T02D1254:253b-3: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i gzhung 'grel gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1254:253b-4: gyi cho ga / dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la
T02D1254:253b-5: 'tshal lo // 'jig dus chu 'dzin mdog can drug lhag bcu yi phyag ldan drag zhal brgyad //
T02D1254:253b-6: brgyad phyed dmar ba'i zhabs rnams g-yas brkyang phyed krung bdud kyi snying gar mnan //
T02D1254:253b-7: stag lpags mnabs shing nyams dgu'i yon tan la brten mgo phreng thod pa can //
T02D1254:253b-8: srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms 'jigs rung bzhad mdzad dgyes pa'i rdo rjes rtag tu srungs //
T02D1254:253b-9: skye bo phal cher sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pas //
T02D1254:253b-10: gzhung mang blta bar nus pa ma yin te /
T02D1254:253b-11: des na phun sum tshogs min 'joms byed pa'i //
T02D1254:253b-12: gzhung 'grel dkyil cho ga shin tu mdor bsdus pa //
T02D1254:253b-13: bdag gi nus pa ji bzhin 'dir bya'o //
T02D1254:253b-14: dang por re zhig slob dpon gsang sngags kyi tshul la mkhas shing /
T02D1254:253b-15: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las 'gro ba 'don pa'i bsams
T02D1254:253b-16: pa can thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa'i
T02D1254:253b-17: stobs kyis chos kyi dbyings rtogs pas ma lus pa'i
T02D1254:253b-18: yul rnams dug med par byas te /
T02D1254:253b-19: nye bar spyod pa'i shes rab kyi tshogs spel bas
T02D1254:253b-20: phyin ci log gi rtog pa las byung ba'i ma
T02D1254:253b-21: rig pa'i ling tog bsal te /
T02D1254:253b-22: rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba dang ldan pa la /
T02D1254:253b-23: slob mas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir lan gsum gyi bar du gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1254:253b-24: de nas de'i sems las byung ba'i bgegs rang gi
T02D1254:253b-25: snying ga'i sa bon gyi gzi brjid kyis bskrad la
T02D1254:253b-26: / rtsa ba'i sngags sam phreng ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas bsrungs nas /
T02D1254:253b-27: 'khor lo can gyi rtsa ba'i sngags dang /
T02D1254:253b-28: bdag med ma'i sngags 'bum phrag re re bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o //
T02D1254:253b-29: de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs su song ste /
T02D1254:253b-30: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1254:253b-31: pas der ram las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1254:253b-32: bsgoms la de'i steng du h'u% las byung ba'i sna
T02D1254:254a-1: nyi ma dang rdo rje dag las rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis sar byas la /
T02D1254:254a-2: rtsa ba'i sngags mngon par bzlas pa'i chus bsang gtor bya'o //
T02D1254:254a-3: de nas sa'i lha mo mdog ser mo zhi ba'i
T02D1254:254a-4: rang bzhin can phyag gnyis kyis gser gyi bum pa
T02D1254:254a-5: bsnams pa / rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug la mchod pa bya ste /
T02D1254:254a-6: dgyes pa'i rdo rje khro bo yis //
T02D1254:254a-7: mchod cing sna tshogs rin chen 'dzin //
T02D1254:254a-8: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02D1254:254a-10: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi tshig gis sa blangs la //
T02D1254:254a-11: sa'i lha mo blos nam mkha'i phyogs su bteg nas /
T02D1254:254a-12: pus mo nub tsam du brkos te /
T02D1254:254a-13: gyo mo la sogs pa bsal te sa de nyid kyis dgang par bya'o //
T02D1254:254a-14: de ltar yang gsang ba de kho na nyid bsdus pa las //
T02D1254:254a-15: pus nub tsam du brkos nas ni //
T02D1254:254a-16: sa de nyid kyis dgang par bya //
T02D1254:254a-17: gal te lhag par gyur na ni //
T02D1254:254a-18: dngos grub yod par ston pa yin //
T02D1254:254a-20: khung bu dgang ba'i dus su mchod pa dang gtor ma ci nus pa yang bya ste /
T02D1254:254a-21: 'di ni khung bu dgang ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1254:254a-22: de nas yang mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1254:254a-23: gyi sar slob dpon dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor
T02D1254:254a-24: dang ldan pas / raksha raksha h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1254:254a-25: zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod la /
T02D1254:254a-26: sngar bstan pa bzhin nyi ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje las byung ba'i rdo rje'i sar bsgoms te /
T02D1254:254a-27: aom ma de ni badzr'i bha ba badzra bandha h'u%/
T02D1254:254a-28: zhes bya ba 'dis sa byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D1254:254a-30: de nas slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi khang par zhugs te /
T02D1254:254a-32: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa ste //
T02D1254:254a-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba btab la /
T02D1254:254a-34: slob dpon gyis kyang dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02D1254:254a-36: cod pan la sogs pas brgyan la rdo rje dang dril bu gzung ngo //
T02D1254:254a-37: cho ga de nyid kyis slob ma bzhi yang goo
T02D1254:254a-38: r'i la sogs par dmigs te phyogs bzhir bzhag la
T02D1254:254a-39: / tshigs su bcad pa bzhis gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D1254:254b-0: de bzhin @254b gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02D1254:254b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02D1254:254b-2: sems dpa' rdo rje las byung ba'i //
T02D1254:254b-3: dkyil 'khor gtso bos bshad du gsol //
T02D1254:254b-4: mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
T02D1254:254b-5: mtshan min thams cad spangs pa yi //
T02D1254:254b-6: kun du bzang po sku yi mchog /
T02D1254:254b-7: dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02D1254:254b-8: zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung //
T02D1254:254b-9: ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba //
T02D1254:254b-10: kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog / dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol //
T02D1254:254b-11: sems can kun gyi sems chen po //
T02D1254:254b-12: rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med //
T02D1254:254b-13: kun du bzang po thugs kyi mchog / dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol //
T02D1254:254b-14: de ltar gsol ba btab pa'i mthar h'um badzro da
T02D1254:254b-15: ti shtha zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo
T02D1254:254b-17: bdag nyid phyag gnyis pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas /
T02D1254:254b-18: mig g-yas par ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom /
T02D1254:254b-19: mig g-yon par ta las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te /
T02D1254:254b-20: khro bo'i lta bas dkyil 'khor gyi sa thams cad du bltas nas /
T02D1254:254b-21: langs te rkang mthil du h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje gdengs po bsgoms la /
T02D1254:254b-22: dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams te /
T02D1254:254b-24: g-yon brkyang la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i 'gros kyis gar
T02D1254:254b-25: gyi tshul gyis kun du bcags nas dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1254:254b-26: sar gnas pa'i bgegs rnams la 'di skad brjod par
T02D1254:254b-27: bya'o // h'u% lus ngag sems la gnas pa yi //
T02D1254:254b-28: bgegs kyi tshogs kun nga la nyon //
T02D1254:254b-29: nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje'i stobs //
T02D1254:254b-30: srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas //
T02D1254:254b-32: sku gsum las byung dgag par bya'o //
T02D1254:254b-33: gal te bdag tshig las 'das na //
T02D1254:254b-34: zhig gyur 'di ni the tshom med //
T02D1254:254b-35: ces brjod nas rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba chen po'i ye shes las byung ba'i las tsam gyis /
T02D1254:254b-36: gang su yang rung ba'i lus srul po la sogs
T02D1254:254b-37: pa bgegs kyi tshogs chen po rnams 'dir ma gnas
T02D1254:254b-38: par dengs shig ces kyang brjod de /
T02D1254:255a-0: de nas yang bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir @255a * //
T02D1254:255a-1: dkyil 'khor gyis sa'i dbus su gnas so //
T02D1254:255a-2: bgegs mthar byed kyi sku smad phur bu'i gzugs can bcu phyung la /
T02D1254:255a-3: phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams bkug ste /
T02D1254:255a-4: aom gha gha gha ta ya gh'a ta ya sarbba dushtana phat /
T02D1254:255a-5: k'i la ya k'i la ya sarbba p'a pam phat h'u% h'u% h'u%/
T02D1254:255a-6: badzra k'i la ya badzra dha ro a'a dzny'a pa
T02D1254:255a-7: ya ti k'a ya b'a ka tsi tta badzra k'i
T02D1254:255a-8: li k'i la ya h'u% phat /
T02D1254:255a-9: ces bya ba'i phur bu'i sngags kyis phur bu btab la /
T02D1254:255a-10: phur bu'i phyi rol du rdo rje ra ba dang /
T02D1254:255a-11: dra ba la sogs pa bsams te /
T02D1254:255a-12: raksha raksha zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1254:255a-13: de nas yang sa'i lha mo me tog la sogs pa nye ba'i longs spyod kyis mchod de //
T02D1254:255a-14: dgyes pa'i rdo rje khro bo yi //
T02D1254:255a-15: mchod cing sna tshogs rin chen 'dzin //
T02D1254:255a-16: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02D1254:255a-19: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02D1254:255a-20: ji ltar bdud kyi stobs bcom pa //
T02D1254:255a-21: de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni //
T02D1254:255a-22: rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D1254:255a-23: zhes bya ba tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis sa'i lha mo sta gon la gnas par bya'o //
T02D1254:255a-24: de nas dkyil 'khor kyi sa bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i dri zhim pos byugs la /
T02D1254:255a-25: bcom ldan 'das dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi so
T02D1254:255a-26: so'i gnas gnas su bdud rtsi lnga'i mandala byas nas
T02D1254:255a-27: / go rims ji lta ba bzhin du nam mkha' la gnas pa'i 'khor lo blos bkug ste /
T02D1254:255a-29: yang mtshams bcing ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D1254:255a-30: ci 'byor ba'i phyi nang gi mchod pas yang dag
T02D1254:255a-31: par mchod nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bstod par
T02D1254:255a-32: bya'o // gti mug gis mnan 'gro bltas nas //
T02D1254:255a-33: 'gro ba'i gti mug rab zhi'i phyir //
T02D1254:255a-34: rdo rje can gyis goo r'ir mdzad //
T02D1254:255a-35: de bas goo r'i bstod phyag 'tshal //
T02D1254:255a-36: zhe sdang gis mnan 'gro bltas nas //
T02D1254:255a-37: 'gro ba'i zhe sdang zhi bya'i phyir //
T02D1254:255a-38: rdo rje can gyis tsoo r'ir mdzad //
T02D1254:255a-39: de bas tsoo r'i bstod phyag 'tshal //
T02D1254:255a-40: nga rgyal gyis mnan 'gro bltas nas //
T02D1254:255a-41: 'gro ba'i nga rgyal zhi bya'i phyir //
T02D1254:255a-42: gtso bos be t'a l'i gzugs mdzad //
T02D1254:255a-43: de bas be t'a bstod phyag 'tshal //
T02D1254:255b-2: gtso bos gha sma r'i gzugs mdzad //
T02D1254:255b-3: de bas gha sma r'i bstod 'dud //
T02D1254:255b-4: bdag med ma dang gnyis med gzugs //
T02D1254:255b-6: ye shes lnga dang sku gsum bdag / rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1254:255b-7: de nas bskor ba byas la //
T02D1254:255b-8: bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i bdug spos thogs te /
T02D1254:255b-9: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D1254:255b-10: h'um he ru ka dpal dpa' bo che //
T02D1254:255b-12: dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1254:255b-14: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02D1254:255b-15: khyed la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1254:255b-16: bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la //
T02D1254:255b-17: de bas bka' drin mdzad par 'os //
T02D1254:255b-19: sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D1254:255b-20: 'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D1254:255b-21: sngags kyi lha gzhan gang lags dang //
T02D1254:255b-22: 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang //
T02D1254:255b-23: gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang //
T02D1254:255b-24: sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams //
T02D1254:255b-25: gang su rdo rje'i spyan can rnams //
T02D1254:255b-26: rdo rje chen po 'di bzhes pas //
T02D1254:255b-28: yo byad ci 'byor pa dag gis //
T02D1254:255b-30: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la //
T02D1254:255b-31: thugs rje thugs dpag mdzad nas kyang //
T02D1254:255b-32: dkyil 'khor par bcas thams cad kyis //
T02D1254:255b-33: thugs rjes dgongs nas nye bar mdzod //
T02D1254:255b-34: ces bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa lan gsum brjod pas lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02D1254:255b-35: 'di ni lha sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1254:255b-36: de nas rtsa ba'i sngags dang phreng ba'i sngags ci nus su bzlas la /
T02D1254:255b-37: ting nge 'dzin gyis nang gi sa sbyang bar bya ste /
T02D1254:255b-38: tho rangs kyi dus su yang mchod pa dang /
T02D1254:255b-39: bstod pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D1254:255b-40: dri'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i lha'i 'khor lo yid kyis nam mkha' la bteg ste /
T02D1254:255b-42: rim pa 'dis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1254:255b-43: rim pa de yang 'di yin te /
T02D1254:255b-44: dang por tshangs thig gnyis btab nas /
T02D1254:256a-0: @256a * // de 'og mtshams kyi thig gnyis gdab //
T02D1254:256a-1: de nas dkyil 'khor tshad dang ni //
T02D1254:256a-2: mthun par gru bzhir gdab par bya //
T02D1254:256a-3: tshangs pa'i thig gis ngos gnyis su //
T02D1254:256a-4: sgo yi 'khor lo'i brgyad char gdab //
T02D1254:256a-5: de nas ngos gcig gyen tshad du //
T02D1254:256a-6: tshon gyis yi thig gdab bya //
T02D1254:256a-7: de nas yang ni sgo yi phyed //
T02D1254:256a-8: tshon sna sgo yi bzhi cha ru //
T02D1254:256a-9: skud pa gnyis pa bri bar bya //
T02D1254:256a-10: de yi tshad du logs thig bri //
T02D1254:256a-11: de nas sgo tshad gsum du bya //
T02D1254:256a-12: lha yi gnas kyi skud pa ni //
T02D1254:256a-13: mtshams su sgo dang mtshungs par gdab //
T02D1254:256a-14: ngos kyi ri mo rnam pa lnga //
T02D1254:256a-15: sgo yi bzhi char kun du gdab //
T02D1254:256a-16: sgo phyed kun du mu khyud de //
T02D1254:256a-17: rin chen sa gzhi de yi phyed //
T02D1254:256a-18: dra ba dra phyed snam bu ni //
T02D1254:256a-19: mu khyud sa dang mtshungs par gdab //
T02D1254:256a-20: ba gam gyi ni sa gzhi dag / de yi phyed du kun du bri //
T02D1254:256a-21: de ltar bris nas thig dbyi ba //
T02D1254:256a-22: gzhan dag tu ni gsal bshad pas //
T02D1254:256a-23: de ltar 'dir brjod yod min te //
T02D1254:256a-24: rang rang gis ni dbye bar bya //
T02D1254:256a-25: de nas ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi tshon sna
T02D1254:256a-26: lngas kha dog legs par btsos pa'i skud pa legs
T02D1254:256a-28: chur dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur du byas te /
T02D1254:256a-29: yang slob dpon phyag gnyis pa dgyes pa'i rdo rjer bsgoms la /
T02D1254:256a-30: g-yas g-yon gyi mig gnyis su ma dang ta las nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te /
T02D1254:256a-31: 'bar ba'i lta bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug la /
T02D1254:256a-35: bdud rtsi lngas byugs te dum bur byas la /
T02D1254:256a-36: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bsrungs nas snod gtsang mar gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1254:256a-37: de skad du yang de kho na nyid bsdus pa las /
T02D1254:256a-38: rab tu myur bar bskul ba'i mig / mig gi rdzi mas 'gugs byed pa //
T02D1254:256a-39: 'bar ba'i lta bas zhes bya ste //
T02D1254:256a-43: aom aa bha ga w'a na sha sa tva s'u
T02D1254:256a-44: pra pra ya tstsha sv'a tsa kra s'u tra na
T02D1254:256a-45: ya h'u% zhes bya bas nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i
T02D1254:256a-46: dkyil 'khor las ye shes kyi skud pa blangs la
T02D1254:256a-47: phan tshun rjes su rtogs pa ste /
T02D1254:256a-48: chos kun phan tshun rjes su 'gro //
T02D1254:256b-0: @256b chos rnams thams cad shin tu yang //
T02D1254:256b-1: rjes su 'gro bar chos kun brjod //
T02D1254:256b-3: slob ma goo r'i'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa dang lhan cig bsgril lo //
T02D1254:256b-4: de nas dza: gsum gyis slob ma la gtad do //
T02D1254:256b-5: bdag nyid kyang de bzhin du brjod nas rdo rje
T02D1254:256b-6: la dkris pa'i skud pa khu tshur g-yon pas bzung
T02D1254:256b-7: ste / nub phyogs su gnas nas /
T02D1254:256b-8: shar phyogs su gnas pa'i slob ma dang lhan cig tu tshangs pa'i thig dang po gdab po //
T02D1254:256b-9: aom badzra s'u tra sa ma ya m'a ti kra ma h'u%/
T02D1254:256b-10: sems can don byed dus su ni //
T02D1254:256b-11: nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1254:256b-12: de dag 'dir gshegs bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1254:256b-13: thig skud sgra yis bskul bar bya //
T02D1254:256b-14: de ltar nam mkha' thig gdab pa na /
T02D1254:256b-15: thig skud gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskul te 'byon par 'gyur ro //
T02D1254:256b-16: de nas bskor phyogs su song ste /
T02D1254:256b-17: gshin rje'i phyogs su gnas nas /
T02D1254:256b-18: byang phyogs su gnas pa'i slob ma dang /
T02D1254:256b-19: tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab cing /
T02D1254:256b-20: de'i 'og tu yang de bzhin du gdab bo //
T02D1254:256b-21: de nas me mtshams su song ste /
T02D1254:256b-22: dbang ldan gyi mtshams na gnas pa'i slob ma dang shar logs kyi thig btab la /
T02D1254:256b-23: yang skor phyogs su rlung mtshams su song ste /
T02D1254:256b-24: bden bral gyi mtshams na gnas pa'i slob ma dang /
T02D1254:256b-25: nub logs kyi thig gdab po //
T02D1254:256b-26: de nyid du gnas de slob ma dbang ldan gyi
T02D1254:256b-27: phyogs su song nas byang logs kyi thig gdab la
T02D1254:256b-28: / yang skor phyogs mi mtshams su song ste /
T02D1254:256b-29: bden bral gyi mtshams na gnas pa'i slob ma dang /
T02D1254:256b-30: lho logs kyi thig gdab po //
T02D1254:256b-31: yang de nyid du gnas te rlung mtshams na gnas

T02D1254:273a-29: gser gyi thur mas sku gzugs kyi spyan phye la /
T02D1254:273a-30: aom di bya aa gne sa m'a dhi dha na pri na ne sv'a h'a /
T02D1254:273a-31: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis ts'a ru'i phud lha la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1254:273a-32: de nas bdag dang slob ma zhi ba dang rgyas par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1254:273a-33: aom badzra pushta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1254:273a-34: zhes bya bas sbyin sreg byas la /
T02D1254:273a-36: de bzhin gshegs pas gsol ba yi //
T02D1254:273a-37: lhag ma sdig pa sbyang phyir zo //
T02D1254:273a-39: ts'a ru'i lhag ma slob ma za ru gzhug go //
T02D1254:273b-0: de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil @273b ba'i sngags bzlas zhing
T02D1254:273b-1: khu tshur g-yas pas bzung ba'i rdo rje'i rtse mos
T02D1254:273b-2: sku gzugs kyi sku smad dang bar dang dbul lan
T02D1254:273b-3: gsum bskor la brtan par byas nas /
T02D1254:273b-4: sku gzugs kyi sum cha'i tshod kyi stegs bu'i steng du /
T02D1254:273b-5: aom su pra ti shtha badzre sv'a h'a /
T02D1254:273b-6: zhes bya bas bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02D1254:273b-7: slob mas sku gzugs la bskor ba dang phyag bya ba dang /
T02D1254:273b-9: slob dpon la mchod pa'i yo byad rnams sbyar te dbul lo //
T02D1254:273b-10: slob dpon gyis kyang phyogs skyong ba rnams la gtor ma phul la /
T02D1254:273b-11: sku gzugs yun ring du bzhugs par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1254:273b-12: bdag dang slob ma zhi bar bya ba'i phyir phyogs skyong rnams la gsol ba gdab ste /
T02D1254:273b-14: rje ste ras ris dang sku gzugs la sogs pa
T02D1254:273b-15: rnams kyi rab gnas mdor bsdus te bya bar 'dod
T02D1254:273b-16: na / bdag nyid rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms la /
T02D1254:273b-17: sku gzugs la sogs pa khrus byas nas /
T02D1254:273b-18: mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bshams te /
T02D1254:273b-19: bdag med pa'i bsam gtan sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D1254:273b-20: skad cig tsam gyis lhar bsgoms la /
T02D1254:273b-21: mig dang sku la sogs par byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1254:273b-22: ye shes sems dpa' bstims nas /
T02D1254:273b-23: phyi nang gi mchod pas yang dag par mchod la de nyid kyi sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla'o //
T02D1254:273b-24: dril bu dang bgrang phreng gi rab gnas ni yig 'bru las gsung rdo rjer bskyed de /
T02D1254:273b-25: de yongs su gyur pa'i dril bur blta'o //
T02D1254:273b-28: 'tsho ba'i don gyi rnal 'byor pa pho mo rnams kyi bgrang phreng la sogs pa ni /
T02D1254:273b-29: sngags tsam bzlas pas byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D1254:273b-30: de nas mchod pa bya ste /
T02D1254:273b-31: sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas rdo rje dril bu gsil la thal mo sbyar te /
T02D1254:273b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bzod par gsol lo //
T02D1254:273b-33: dkyil 'khor la sogs cho ga ni /
T02D1254:273b-34: byas pas bdag gis dge thob pa //
T02D1254:273b-35: des ni sems can thams cad kyi //
T02D1254:273b-36: sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms byed shog / dpal dgyes
T02D1254:273b-37: pa rdo rje'i gzhung 'grel gyi dkyil 'khor dang sbyin
T02D1254:274a-0: sreg dang / rab gnas kyi cho ga slob dpon nag po'i zhal @274a * //
T02D1254:274a-1: snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1254:274a-3: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po nag po'i zhal snga nas /
